message.body: So what's the dealio
The show begins at eight right? i'll be at your place around seven thirty, i gotta do some mothers day stuff with my mom right before is all. I'll be spe
nding the night tho!
Ok awesome! I'll have to buy a card and some flowers after the show. My house is really close to the venue so we won't be late
Swag, i'm gonna get my mom the cake of dreams she better never talk back ever
Lmfao she will love it no doubt. She'll never give you shit for anything again
Thats what i thought. Hey, how long do bus to train transfers last, and vice versa
I'm not sure... I'm guessing half an hour? Maybe an hour
Damn the mta, alright then see you tonight!
Yay! See ya
What train stations are near your house- the venue? All trains are down
Fuck show starts at eight haven't been able to leave brooklyn yet what the fuck!
Oh no! Well we might miss the opening act but nbd
Who are they? And when does the show go on to lol
Theyre called Ducktails. I've never heard of them. I'm not sure when the show ends
How far away are you?
Also, I just double checked. The doors open at 8 and the show starts at 9. We've got some time!
Getting atlantic in ten, i can catch the two there...
Ok no rush, take your time
Thank goodness getting there asap
Are you coming down stairs?
Tell them you're going to apartment 4J
